column4: hey guys, I am wondering how to strip my install of ubuntu down to just the base install, I want it to boot to a shell, and I do not need any other packages installed, any idea?
because I am making a livecd out of it when I am done
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
thats a royal pain, there is like 20 of them
ldconfig: Can't create temporary cache file /etc/ld.so.cache~: No such file or directory
why wont apt-get remove the dependencies?
